meanings.definition: The state or quality of being previous.
meanings.sent1: The previousnesses of the event were evident in the historical records.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the previousnesses of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The previousnesses of the situation made it seem like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent4: The previousnesses of his wisdom was like a beacon in the darkness of ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The previousnesses of the decision lingered in the air, heavy with significance.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The previousnesses of the sunrise marked the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent2: The previousnesses of the meeting ensured a smooth transition to the next agenda item.
meanings.sent3: The previousnesses of the dessert before dinner caused quite a stir at the party.
meanings.sent4: The previousnesses of her arrival set the stage for an unforgettable evening.
meanings.sent5: The previousnesses of the melody echoed through the halls, setting a nostalgic tone.
